name: Dragonbound Warrior
description: The Dragonbound Warrior embodies the might of its draconic masters; it wields a spear and is equipped for both melee and ranged combat.
memorable: Possesses abilities that enhance combat effectiveness through draconic powers.
goals: Typically serves as a minion or guardian for dragon masters.
relations: Often found alongside dragons or other dragon-worshiping creatures.
environment: Commonly found in areas associated with dragons, such as mountainous regions or lairs.
strengths: Proficient in stealth, perception, and survival skills.
weaknesses: Limited hit points and moderate damage output reduce combat performance.
attacks: Engages enemies using a spear, dealing moderate piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Draconic Smite, which adds 1d6 elemental damage to its attacks.
equipment: A spear for melee and ranged combat.
senses: Has a passive perception of 14, showcasing good awareness of threats.
skills: Proficient in athletics, stealth, perception, and survival, with notable bonuses.
additional_information: Draconic Resistance grants damage reduction against specific elemental attacks.
Serves as a strategic ambusher due to its stealth abilities.
Represents the influence of its draconic master in combat.
Can adapt its attacks based on the elemental type of its master.
Relatively low complexity for a CR 1/4 creature.
test_queries: dragon servant adept in ambush tactics
